column5: My condolences on your loss. HH

On behalf of my family and from the bottom of my heart, thank you my friends!  It’s real comforting to know that in times of sorrow, I can rely on my extended OFC family and want to thank everyone for that.  Jacques

My deepest condolences Jacques. I've got no great words of wisdom for you unfortunately. I've been there and know the feelings that are raging thru your mind... just think of the good times and smile each day when you do so. Cryings just fine as well !
My sympathies Jacques.
May the hurt and pain pass quickly  My condolences go out to you and your family mon ami
Our prayers.
thanks for sharing that with us, Jacques...may you and your family remember each and every good time and special moment...from the little that we know of you, he was clearly a great guy
I would like to offer my sincerest condolenses.  to you and all your family.
I may not know you, but this brought a tear to my eye.  I'm so very sorry for your loss, my thoughts are with you and your family.  All the best, Gov

Jeez that is a tough pill to swallow. You where THERE and you have my respect for that. Remember the good....AND...the bad....cause i'm sure the old man would have wanted it that way.  Godspeed to you are and the rest of your family.
My sincerest condolences. I lost my mother last Sept. in much the same circumstances. I know it's a tough time. The pain of your loss will subside as your cherished memories fill your thoughts.
Very sorry to hear, I can relate. Deepest condolences.
I am sorry for your loss.

Thanks again everyone for your compassion and generosity, it really helps.  We still have another big day ahead of us, the service which is going to be next Wednesday.  Mom is doing OK but still a little shaken from the experience.  It's understandable they were together for 56 years and to end up by her herself is scary.  The 3 kids (my sister, brother and I) told her that we are there to help and to not hesitate in calling us when needed.  Again on behalf of my family, Thank you everyone! Jacques
im so sorry for your loss.  my condelences to you and your family

Sorry for your loss. I found that getting back out fishing helped ease the pain when those close to me perished. Your father will always be proud of you. Take care of yourself through these tough moments.  Godspeed, ehg
Sorry about your loss.I offer my condolences to you and your family.
my condolances to you and your family in this tough time.  jason
Very sorry to learn of the passing of your Father Jacques   keep the memories bright---and hold him in your heart   Take Care  ID1
Sorry to hear about your loss Jaques. Keep your head up bud.  Denis
Sorry for you loss  Bm
My deepest sympathies Jacques.MTP
Maria and I send our condolences Jacques...
Our sympathies to you and your family.
Keep your head held high. Sorry for your loss
I lost my Dad in '03 and I still miss him dearly...My condolences.
my condolences for your loss
Sorry to hear that. All the best to you and your family. May you never forget.  Dirk...
Sorry to hear about your dad. All the best to you and yours.
Your father will be with you every time your on the lake. Just talk to him.  My sincere condolences.
So sorry to hear your sad news Jacques, my condolences to you and your family.
My deepest condolences to you and your family Jacques.....

Sincere heartfelt condolences to you and your family Jaques. My Dad too battled with courage and dignity to the end. It is not at all selfish in any way to want to see his suffering end. He is now at peace.  J...
sorry for your loss jacques take care

Jacques...  Bly and I send our condolences to you and all that knew him.  I personally know exactly what you went through.  Me and my family were at my dad's bedside when he passed away from cancer.  Yes, seeing the gasping for breath is incredibly difficult to see...and I understand what you were feeling.  I also had a wave of "thank goodness it's over", and felt very selfish for it....but I realized that not wanting your loved one suffer any longer isn't selfish...your dad, and my dad are in a better place now...free of sickness and definately watching over us.  Take care.

I am really sorry, for your loss, my dad has been all of the things one could ask for and as you have stated my Friend. My heat goes out to you and your family and enjoy the priceless memories.  FLEX - John
Very sorry to hear, my condolences to all.
Sorry for your loss Jacques, condolences to you and your family.
I too, am sorry for your loss, Jacques.  My condolences to you and your family in this time of sorrow.   Will
Sorry to hear that Jacques. take care.

My sincere condolences to you and your family, Leechman.  You should consider yourself fortunate that you had the opportunity to take care of, and be with your father in his last days.  Those that don't get that opportunity sometimes have to live with regrets for the rest of their days.  I can tell you from personal experience that it's a heavy burden to carry.  God bless you in your time of sorrow.
sorry for your loss, keep him in your heart forever
My condolences Leechman.   Its a tough situation to go through.  You are surrounded by friends and family and people here on the forum if you need anything.
My heart goes out to you and your family...

So very sorry to hear Jacques,  remember the good times, and know that you'll never have to spend another day on the water, soft or hard, without him proudly watchin' you smash 'em. My condolences to you and your family brother...  Ryan

Mes sympathies Jacques!!!! I lost my dad 3.5 years ago and I still remember that night like it was yesterday.  He took his last breath as I was hugging him .  I will cherish that till the day I die!!!!!!!!!!!  My Dad had alzheimers and he hadn't spoken a single word or recognized any one of us for the last 2 years of his life.  Plus he lived 9 hours away so I would see him 1-2 a year. This helps me a lot.
My deepest condolences to you and your family; know that your extended OFC family is here for you.
That's a terrible loss to bare my friend..  Je vous offres mes pensées et mes prières.  Prends soins mon grand.  On es là pour toi.  HD
Deepest condolences to you, Jacques and your family.
I'm very sorry to hear about your loss. I'm sure that you are right that he is in a better place right now. My condolences from my family to yours for your loss.
Sorry to hear it, condolences.
Jacques, my deepest condolences on the loss of your father

After reading your replies, I'm speechless..... in the sense of the generosity of the members of this community and want to thank you so very much from the bottom of my heart.  I know that some of you have gone through this and your replies have brought me relief and understanding of the emotions I was experiencing and want to thank you for that.  For those that are going through this, want to say that, being at bed side is most comforting for your loved ones.... It makes them feel that they are not alone and not be scared, even with their body deteriorating at a fast pace.  It's one less burden they have to worry about  Again, on behalf of my family, thank you for being compassionate and so generous.... You guys and gals are the best  Jacques
Sorry bud,,,the pain will pass but the memories never will
My sincerest condolences to your and your family Leechman.
Cancer is vicious... I pray you can remember better times, and forget the recent tough times.  My condolences,

It's not selfish to want a loved one's pain to end.  I'd bet he was thinking the same thing, watching you suffer through the situation with him.  You were there for him - that's what matters.  Deepest condolences from Jeff & I.
Very sorry for your loss.Are thoughts are with you and your family. Dan Le Tual
My heart goes out to you, I lost my mother the same way..   time heals all.
I am sorry to hear your loss, my sincere condolences to you and your love ones.
Sorry for your loss.  May he rest in peace.
Jacques, my most sincere condolences man.. I know it's hard, but he's in a better place right now.   Time heals bud, be strong.
My deepest condolences to you and your family Jacques
I am sorry to hear about your loss, I will like to offer my condolences to you and your family in this hard time.
My Condolences Jacques.  I wish you and yours a fond memory of everything he stood up for and that you never forget...  may he Rest In Peace...
Sorry to hear about your lost. My condolences to you and your family .

So sorry to hear this Jacques,  They will always live in our hearts forever. I lost my mother 10 days ago to similar circumstances. Nothing you can prepare yourself for. I don't think it is selfish to say the pain and suffering has ended.  My thoughts and prayers to you and your family.
Jacques I am very saddened to here of your loss My father is going through the same battle right now it sure is crazy times. My thoughts are sent out to your family

I'm terribly sorry to hear that Jacques.  My condolances to you and your family.  My father is battling lung cancer right now.  The chemo knocked the socks off him and put him in hospital, so they stopped giving him that, then just two weeks ago they tried him on the chemo pill, which made his whole body break out in hives and rashes, so now he's off that too.  I'm afraid his end will be the same as your fathers not too soon from now.  What a shame.  I feel for you and hope you remember the good times you two had.  Joey
My very sincere condolences Jacques,  Good to have family near.  Grant
I'm so, so sorry.  Can't imagine what you and your family are going through.

It's not selfish at all, just natural. I understand where you are coming from, I was the same this past October when my Dad lost his battle with brain cancer.  My condolences go out to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family...  Maureen
I think JohnF said it very well!  I am sorry to hear this Jacques. My deepest condolences to you and your family!
Sorry to hear that Jacque and condolances from my home to yours.  It's been a sad month around OFC.
My condolences to you and your family.
I, and many of us here, know exactly how you feel Jacques. Lost my dad to lung cancer back in 2001, the day before my birthday. Do not feel selfish in any way. Please accept my sincere condolences.

Jacques, my condolences.  I too lost my Dad to lung cancer 4 years ago and I felt the same way as you in that you didn't want to see him suffer anymore.  You're not being selfish at all, just not wanting to see someone you care about in that condition.  Jim
Please accept my heartfelt condolences Jacques.
Sorry for your loss

Guys,  Just don't know where to start with all this....  Lost my mentor and most importantly my best friend..... My father had been fighting lung cancer for the past year and a half getting chemo & radiation treatments.  Was admitted into a palliative care center about 5 weeks ago, it ended today at 12:25pm.....  Will never forget the last weeks spent at his bed side.... he was a fighter and even today, fought to the very end... he just didn't want to let go....  The hardest part for me was to see him gasp for air all the while our family was there, including his sister that is celebrating her 79th birthday today.  He definitely got great care and I'm thankful that his suffering ended.... I just could not stand seeing him that way anymore.  Might be selfish on my part but he is now in peace and watching over us.... Will miss him dearly.  Jacques aka Leechman
Sorry to hear that Leechman, you have my condolences.

Please accept mine and Jackie condolences, tough to take !! At least, as you say, he is at peace now. I lost my father many years ago now, and still admonish myself for being unable to get to the funeral on time. [in England ]
My condolences Jacques to you and your family  Rob

Sorry to hear that Jacques. Terrible news for sure but as you say, he's no longer suffering. My and J's condolences to you and your family. I wish I could say something to help make you feel better but there probably isn't.  Time for you to take care of YOU now.
May I extend my humble and heartfelt condolences Jacques, to you and your family.
My deepest condolences to you and your family Jacques.
Sorry to here.  I will pray for you family to get over this trial.  God bless
So sorry to hear this Jacques, our deepest condolences to you and your family.  Best regards, Sam
My condolences Jacques...as you said..."the sufferring has ended"...
My heart goes out to you Jacques. Very sorry for your loss.
My heart goes out to you and your family Jacques, my deepest condolences.
It's a long struggle Leechman.  I've had to do that a couple times at bedside with family and it is tough.  I can feel what you've had to go through.  My condolences to you and your family.
My Condolences Jacques.Thoughts and Prayers are with you . Dave
Jacques, Im overcome right now.  I have a very hard time with losing family.  Thoughts and prayes my friend.
So tough to watch them go like that, Jacques. I too watched as my father went the same way 15 years ago.  I feel your pain and loss as well, God bless...
Sorry for your loss Jacques

I've felt like that before. Most of us think we're being selfish when we feel like you do, but the truth is we're probably being anything but selfish. Think of it this way. You were ready to lose the company of someone dear to you for his own peace & comfort. Now you're comforted because he's not hurting any more, not because because you were hurting. There's nothing wrong with feeling that way. Don't beat yourself up over it. You cared. And if that's the way he raised you to feel, then I'll bet he wouldn't have wanted it any other way.  I'm sorry for your loss, Jacques.  JF
Sorry to hear the news Jacques ,, Condolences from the Family and I .
my condolences.
A sad moment for sure, hopefully fond memories will help you.
Really sorry to hear this Jaques. Condolences to you and yours.  Sinker
I would like to offer my sincerest condolenses.

I hope that I am there when my Dad passes, and I also hope to die with my family nearby.  Maybe the things that happened were horrible and tragic, but the way they happened was best?  God Bless you and your family, Jacques.
I am sorry to hear this Jacques, My  deepest condolences to you and your family.
